question: Which of the following is not true about B V R Mohan Reddy committee? 1.The committee was formed to come up with a plan for expansion in engineering education. 2.It recommended to stop setting up new colleges from 2020.
explanation: B V R Mohan Reddy committee was appointed to come up with a medium and short-term perspective plan for expansion in engineering education. It recommended stop setting up new colleges from 2020 and review the creation of new capacity every two years after that.
